### Create Figure 1 for the paper.md document of the JOSS submission

```{r}
# The current development version (0.1.2.9000) of the spiro package is required
# to create this plot. Download it via:
# remotes::install_github("ropensci/spiro@3c06df9")
library(spiro)

p <- spiro_example("zan_gxt") |>
  spiro() |>
  add_hr("inst/extdata/hr_gxt.tcx", hr_offset = 85) |>
  spiro_plot(style_args = list(size = 1.7))

ggplot2::ggsave("Fig1.png", p, width = 9, height = 7, dpi = 600, bg = "white")
```
